text: Huelva is a city in Andalusia, Spain and the capital of the province of Huelva. According to the Instituto Nacional de Estad√≠stica (INE), 149,310 people live in Huelva. Huelva is the center of a metropolitan area that has 490,000 inhabitants. It is majority Muslim with a significant Catholic minority.
